iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 74 0A FF 96 2C E0 00 00 }  // JNZ + CALL ExitProcess (offsets wildcards)
        $pattern1 = { 6A 04 5A 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C0 }  // PUSH + POP + CALL + TEST (context around VirtualProtect)
        $pattern2 = { 83 E8 01 75 1A FF 96 2E E0 00 00 }  // SUB ECX + JNE + CALL (ECX check logic)

    condition:
        any of them
}
iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures

        $pattern1 = { 6A 04 5A 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C0 }  // PUSH + POP + CALL + TEST (context around VirtualProtect)
        $pattern2 = { 83 E8 01 75 1A FF 96 2E E0 00 00 }  // SUB ECX + JNE + CALL (ECX check logic)
